df['r_mean'] = df['mean'].apply(reciprocal)
df['r_median'] = df['median'].apply(reciprocal)

df['r_prob_median'] = df['r_median']/df['r_median'].sum()
df['percentage_mean'] = df['r_prob_mean'].apply(lambda x:round(x*100,1))
